title: DeenTight
content:
Hi, does anyone know if this is a font or is it something drawn?

Thanks,  
Mukhtar

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019135039im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DeentightBannerL_4547.jpg)

author: mukhtarsanders

comments.content:
it looks like the person made that themselves for the project. I doubt that is a full font just a logo.

Diavlo has a similar flavor to it and could be modified to do somehting like this.

[http://www.josbuivenga.demon.nl/diavlo.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019135039/http:/www.josbuivenga.demon.nl/diavlo.html "http://www.josbuivenga.demon.nl/diavlo.html")

Hi jfldesign,

Thanks for the reply - thats what I was thinking. Diavlo is a good substitute - thanks.
